attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see news regarding trump 2020 and my phone CRASHED right when I logged on. My phone has not worked the same for the past couple hours. Do not download this app unless you want to wait on a 2 hour phone call with apple.

attributes.review: I got nightmares from this. First off Iâ€™m vegan and the thought of cheese just simply scares me. So when I open this app and see a Cheeto pop out at me I freak out. This was a great inconvenience to me and was DETRIMENTAL to my health. I pray that nobody should have to go through the same scarring experience I did. If you respect the vegan lifestyle do NOT download the awful app.
